name: Just Dodge, LOL
description:
Disclamer

This game brings a lot of anger due to nearly inadequate challenges and an unbalanced difficulty curve. Most people who tested the game dropped it around level 5. Think twice before purchasing.

Description

Just Dodge, LOL is a top-down action game that brings a set of trials to the player, while requiring mastering of just one skill: dodging. Earn money, purchase upgrades, and beat challenges to prove that you deserve to be called a Dodge Grandmaster. The game is designed to be hard: no pain - no gain.

Game Feartures

  • No lives or game-overs, repeat each trial as long as you want.
  • Multiple upgrades allow for building different completion strategies.
  • Secrets. Secrets everywhere...
  • Various level designs.
  • Catchy soundtrack!
